title: The.Eyes.of.Ara-POSTMORTEM
description:
P O S T M O R T E M
2 0 1 6

presents for nothin but our pleasure

The Eyes of Ara
(c) 100 Stones Interactive

Release-Date: 07/16
Protection: Steam
Disc.Count: 1 DVD
Game.Type: Adventure
Language: English

G A M E N O T E S

Alone on a remote island stands an ancient weathered
castle, steeped in legend, shrouded in mystery. For
years it has remained quiet and undisturbed, and yet
still the townspeople recall old stories of restless
dreams, violent storms, and the eerie glow of ghostly
lights dancing in the mist. Recently a mysterious radio
signal has begun broadcasting from somewhere within the
ancient walls. Something inside the castle has awoken
and someone needs to venture inside to uncover the
truth

G R O U P N O T E S

We have enough money, beer, girls or whatever at the moment

Besides:

POSTMORTEM will not pre any updates
or patches. Don't like that idea?
* BUY THE GAME! *

G R E E T i N G S

Skid Row, Unleashed
0x0007, Genesis

It's just a competition!
Support the Software-Developer
if you like this game!
